Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGOBE; RELIEF
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate-cone shaped lamp, ovoidal in outline, with a disc that is marked with a very striking moulding and with a ribbon handle at the rear. Pink-coloured paste and on the surface remnants of a coating of a whitish colour, partially lost. On the disc we find a decoration in relief consisting of circles and volutes arranged radially. All around this, a zoomorphic decoration (fish). A channel is indicated by four parallel lines in relief. Signs of use in the light orifice.
